Text:
Every time i watch these documentaries (or read a book by Chomsky or one of the participates) i wonder how many actually understand how bad our system is and how big is our personal role in perpetuating our own demise.

After all some of these people have been warning us about this since the late 70s!!!!! and then we worry about our freedom to download stuff meanwhile our freedom to choose how to live is already compromised and mortgaged :(
Totally agree, all this shit has been out there forever and nobody seems to give a shit.
So I watched this.  Now what?  If you still feel like voting this November, you weren't paying attention.  I feel totally fucked after watching this.
